scripts.client-js: node ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --baseUrl ./src/ --outFile src/app/static/js/all.js --experimentalDecorators --lib dom,es5,es6,es2015 --target ES5 --module AMD --moduleResolution node src/app/client/index.ts
scripts.start:darwin:linux: npm run-script css:darwin:linux && npm run-script client-js && node --inspect -r ts-node/register src/app/server.ts
scripts.docker: npm run-script containerize-dev && docker run -p 8080:8080 -v `pwd`/src:/audiocommons/src -v `pwd`/tests:/audiocommons/tests audiocommons_dev npm run-script ${1}
scripts.client-js:win32: cmd /c .\node_modules\.bin\tsc.cmd --baseUrl ./src/ --outFile src/app/static/js/all.js --experimentalDecorators --lib dom,es5,es6,es2015 --target ES5 --module AMD --moduleResolution node src/app/client/index.ts
scripts.start:win32: npm run-script css:win32 && npm run-script client-js:win32 && cmd /c .\node_modules\.bin\ts-node.cmd src/app/server.ts
scripts.docker-watch-js:win32: npm run-script containerize-dev && docker run -p 8080:8080 -v ./src:/audiocommons/src -v ./tests:/audiocommons/tests audiocommons_dev npm run-script watch
